Name: Fragile contents secured by museum putty, Velcro or other weak but sticky stuff

GeneralInformation.Description: Costing to be furnished by user.  Consequence data assumes 16 SF of damage area.
GeneralInformation.Author: Not Given
GeneralInformation.Notes: This component requires user specified cost and time consequence data.  Values within PACT are defaults (equal to zero) and do not represent actual consequence.

DamageStates.Description: Object falls off shelf or shelf overturns and object breaks or object breaks within cabinet
DamageStates.RepairMeasures: Replace object.  Note:  user must supply cost of replacement.
